mapper.select: /* BoardMapper.selectPrevNextBoard */ select (select board_id from tb_board where board_id < #{id} and board_id like concat(left(#{id},3),'%') order by board_id desc limit 1) as prev_board_id ,(select board_id from tb_board where board_id > #{id} and board_id like concat(left(#{id},3),'%') order by board_id limit 1) as next_board_id from tb_board where 1=1 and board_id = #{id}
